title: Metta Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Social enterprise under Metta Welfare Association, previous named Happy Arts Deli. Provides vegetarian food and pastry. A la carte menu, specials, eggless cake. Seats 100. Has a retail section that sells instant noodles, organic juices, and health supplements. Also works as a venue for buffets and private events. Trains youths with special needs with the opportunity to acquire work experience in order to develop the necessary skills and attitudes for their future employment. Near Simei MRT. Previously 100% veg, but menu now has meat items Mon-Fri, July 2015.
